head_office_address: Suite 2, Wicklow Enterprise Park The Murrough Wicklow Town
eu_initiatives: All policy and legislation relevant to native woodlands, i.e. The Habitats Directive, The Birds Directive, Water Framework Directive and Appropriate Assessment Directive.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Woodlands of Ireland is an inclusive, membership organisation dedicated to native woodlands. The primary objectives of Woodlands of Ireland are: 
 
- to generate awareness of native woodlands amongst policy makers and the general public 
- to develop projects and sustainable management strategies aimed at ensuring the future viability of native woodlands
relevant_communication: Relevant COST Actions such as E4, E27 and CA15206 - PESFOR-Woodlands and Water, where we participated/are partcipating. All publications arising from same.
